frontmatter.description: As Tableau users increasingly seek insight on the go, mobile dashboards are becoming an increasingly common request. In this post i show you how to disable the auto generated mobile layouts if they often render a layout you dont lile.
frontmatter.title: Disabling the auto generation of phone layouts in Tableau

frontmatter.description: A super brief roundup of 2017 conference. A little lighter than last years effort but mainly because in 2018, I'll be taking a slightly different approach to vlogging having claimed 2017 would be the year it would happen. Stay tuned and enjoy.
frontmatter.title: Tableau Conference 2017: Las Vegas Roundup

frontmatter.description: One question I often get is how I manage my workflow for mobile device designs in Tableau. Depending on your version this can be tricky especially if youd like to test things in a semi realistic environment. In this post i show one way you can test in the browser, without a device.
frontmatter.title: Mobile device test Tableau dashboards without a device.
